pull_request.title: Upgrade to ign-transport3, output camera data via ign-transport

update.description: This updates gazebo to `ign-transport3`, and will output camera sensor data on an ignition topic. The original gazebo topic is still valid. I did not deprecate the gazebo topic here. We can do that in gazebo9.

pullrequest.title: Upgrade to ign-transport3, output camera data via ign-transport

content.raw: Let's assume we're in `Update()` executing `this->dataPtr->filterPubs.find()` without any synchronization primitive. Concurrently, we could receive a service request for adding or removing a filter. Both callbacks (`NewFilter()` or `RemoveFilter()`) modify `this->dataPtr->filterPubs`.
content.html: Let's assume we're in Update() executing this->dataPtr->filterPubs.find() without any synchronization primitive. Concurrently, we could receive a service request for adding or removing a filter. Both callbacks (NewFilter() or RemoveFilter()) modify this->dataPtr->filterPubs.

pullrequest.title: Upgrade to ign-transport3, output camera data via ign-transport

content.raw: I think there's a potential race condition accessing `this->dataPtr->filterPubs` here. Other filterPubs can be added or removed in the callbacks.
content.html: I think there's a potential race condition accessing this->dataPtr->filterPubs here. Other filterPubs can be added or removed in the callbacks.
